content.body: jarhar: The code in the PR branch of https://github.com/WebKit/WebKit/pull/18785 has a working implementation of auto-expanding `details`. If you have time to build from that and try it, let me know if you find any problems. I put it together about a month ago but so far it’s otherwise been unreviewed (maybe due to waiting to get the content-visibility implementation further along).
